function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Current COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Disruption of life and society","Mitigation":"Implement public health measures, vaccination, and effective health policies","Technologies":"Data analytics, contact tracing apps, telemedicine","People":"Society at large","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Human health risk of global magnitude","Impact":"Global health crisis and significant impact on society","Mitigation":"Global cooperation on public health, vaccination campaigns, and health infrastructure development","Technologies":"Global health data sharing, vaccine distribution technology, telehealth infrastructure","People":"Global population","Owner":"International health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of human health in sustainability goals","Impact":"Neglect of a crucial aspect of sustainability, leading to health crises","Mitigation":"Incorporating human health into sustainability frameworks, promoting health-oriented policies and initiatives","Technologies":"Health impact assessments, public health monitoring systems, health education platforms","People":"Policy makers, sustainability advocates","Owner":"Government, NGOs, sustainability organizations"}]}
